DOC.detailed_description: Rationale : Iliac vein compression common cause leg abdominal complaint difficult diagnose . Although combination duplex ultrasonography , magnetic resonance venography two-plane phlebography able show compression , suspect iliac vein compression identify . Intravascular ultrasound appear high diagnostic value , far expensive . In investigator ' experience balloon occlusion test common iliac vein phlebography diagnose iliac vein compression due collateral network visualise . The general consensus pelvic collateral sign pathology , though investigator would like validate test show balloon occlusion test healthy subject identify collateral network . Objective : The objective study identify whether venography balloon occlusion common iliac vein value diagnosis iliac vein compression syndrome . Study design : This observational study healthy subject compare patient population suspect iliac vein compression . Study population : Healthy subject age 18 45 patient suspected iliac vein compression show sign compression venography . Diagnostic test : Subjects undergo diagnostic phlebography , common iliac vein occlude balloon inflation contrast inject identify whether network pelvic collateral appear . Main study parameters/endpoints : The main endpoint study presence collateral cross midline balloon occlusion leave common iliac vein , score present Additionally , quantitive analysis collateral perform .
